frame.label: Connect Account
frame.link:
Enter your Nuxeo Connect account information and click on 'connect' button to retrieve the 'Studio' projects associated with your account. This step is required if you want to bind your Nuxeo plugins to a Studio project.
For more information on Nuxeo Connect and Nuxeo Studio click here: http://connect.nuxeo.com
